description: artist: Jorge Rivera-Herrans, Luke Holt, Cast of EPIC: The Musical

lyrics.english: You can relax, my friend
lyrics.korean: 긴장을 풀어도 돼요, 내 벗이여

lyrics.english: Huh?
lyrics.korean: 허?

lyrics.english: I can tell you're getting nervous
lyrics.korean: 당신이 긴장하고 있다는 걸 알겠어요

lyrics.english: So do yourself a service
lyrics.korean: 그러니 스스로를 편안하게 해 줘요

lyrics.english: And try to relax, my friend
lyrics.korean: 그리고 긴장을 풀려고 해 봐요, 내 벗이여

lyrics.english: I'm fine, Polites
lyrics.korean: 난 괜찮네, 폴리테스

lyrics.english: Think of all that we have been through
lyrics.korean: 우리가 겪어 온 모든 일들을 생각해 봐요

lyrics.english: We'll survive what we get into
lyrics.korean: 우린 우리가 처할 상황에서 살아남을 거예요

lyrics.english: I know that you're tired of the war and bloodshed
lyrics.korean: 당신이 전쟁과 유혈 사태에 지쳤다는 걸 알아요

lyrics.english: Tell me, is this how we're supposed to live?
lyrics.korean: 말해 봐요, 이게 우리가 살아야 할 방식인가요?

lyrics.english: Look at how you grip your sword, enough said
lyrics.korean: 당신이 칼을 잡는 방식을 봐요, 말 다 했죠

lyrics.english: Why should we take when we could give?
lyrics.korean: 우리가 줄 수 있을 때 왜 빼앗아야만 하나요?

lyrics.english: You could show a person that you trust them
lyrics.korean: 당신은 다른 이에게 그를 믿는다는 것을 보여줄 수 있어요

lyrics.english: When you stop and lower your guard
lyrics.korean: 당신이 멈춰 서서 경계를 낮출 때

lyrics.english: Here we have a chance for some adjustment
lyrics.korean: 여기 우리에게 약간의 적응을 위한 기회가 있군요

lyrics.english: Give it a try, it's not that hard, I'm telling you
lyrics.korean: 시도해 봐요, 그렇게 어렵지 않아요, 정말이에요

lyrics.english: This life is amazing when you greet it with open arms
lyrics.korean: 두 팔 벌려 맞이할 때 이 삶은 정말 놀라워요

lyrics.english: Whatever we face, we'll be fine if we're leading from the heart
lyrics.korean: 우리가 무엇을 맞이하든, 마음으로부터 앞장선다면 우린 괜찮을 거예요

lyrics.english: No matter the place, we can light up the world
lyrics.korean: 어디서든 상관없이, 우리는 세상을 밝힐 수 있어요

lyrics.english: Here's how to start
lyrics.korean: 이렇게 시작하는 거예요

lyrics.english: Greet the world with open arms
lyrics.korean: 두 팔 벌려 세상을 맞이해요

lyrics.english: Greet the world with open arms
lyrics.korean: 두 팔 벌려 세상을 맞이해요

lyrics.english: Welcome!
lyrics.korean: 환영해!

lyrics.english: Stay back!
lyrics.korean: 물러서라!

lyrics.english: Stay back!
lyrics.korean: 물러서!

lyrics.english: My friend, greet the world with open arms
lyrics.korean: 내 벗이여, 두 팔 벌려 세상을 맞이하세요

lyrics.english: We're only here for food
lyrics.korean: 우린 단지 식량을 찾아 여기에 왔다

lyrics.english: Food?
lyrics.korean: 식량?

lyrics.english: Six hundred friends are waiting for us to show our faces
lyrics.korean: 600명의 친구들이 우리가 얼굴을 보여주기를 기다리고 있다

lyrics.english: Food!
lyrics.korean: 식량!

lyrics.english: Stay back, I'm warning you
lyrics.korean: 물러서라, 경고한다

lyrics.english: If we don't get back safely, my men will turn this place into blazes
lyrics.korean: 우리가 무사히 돌아가지 못한다면, 내 부하들이 이 곳을 불바다로 만들 것이다

lyrics.english: Here you go!
lyrics.korean: 여기 있어!

lyrics.english: See?
lyrics.korean: 보셨죠?

lyrics.english: This life is amazing when you greet it with open arms
lyrics.korean: 두 팔 벌려 맞이할 때 이 삶은 정말 놀라워요

lyrics.english: Whatever we face, we'll be fine if we're leading from the heart
lyrics.korean: 우리가 무엇을 맞이하든, 마음으로부터 앞장선다면 우린 괜찮을 거예요

lyrics.english: No matter the place, we can light up the world
lyrics.korean: 어디서든 상관없이, 우리는 세상을 밝힐 수 있어요

lyrics.english: Here's how to start
lyrics.korean: 이렇게 시작하는 거예요

lyrics.english: Greet the world with open arms
lyrics.korean: 두 팔 벌려 세상을 맞이해요

lyrics.english: Greet the world with open arms
lyrics.korean: 두 팔 벌려 세상을 맞이해요

lyrics.english: My friend, I wish that I could say that I agree
lyrics.korean: 내 벗이여, 나도 동의한다고 말할 수 있기를 바라네

lyrics.english: But look at the way this fruit is glowing and filled with glowing seeds
lyrics.korean: 하지만 이 과일이 빛을 발하는 방식과 빛나는 씨앗으로 차 있는 것을 봐

lyrics.english: It took me a while to notice just what kind of fruit they eat
lyrics.korean: 저들이 어떤 과일을 먹는지 알아차리는 데 시간이 좀 걸렸어

lyrics.english: It's a lotus, it controls your mind and never lets you free
lyrics.korean: 이건 연꽃일세, 자네의 정신을 조종하고 절대로 놓아 주지 않아

lyrics.english: That's what we'd get with open arms
lyrics.korean: 이게 우리가 두 팔 벌려 얻은 것일세

lyrics.english: Lotus eaters, I'd like to show my friend that kindness is brave
lyrics.korean: 연꽃 먹는 사람들이여, 내 벗에게 친절이란 용감한 것임을 보여주고 싶소

lyrics.english: Could you tell me where there's other food to eat?
lyrics.korean: 다른 먹을거리가 어디에 있는지 알려 줄 수 있겠소?

lyrics.english: The cave!
lyrics.korean: 동굴!

lyrics.english: A cave! You're saying there's a cave where we could feast?
lyrics.korean: 동굴이라! 우리가 배불리 먹을 수 있는 동굴이 있다는 거요?

lyrics.english: And where do we sail to find this food-filled cave?
lyrics.korean: 그럼 이 먹을 것이 가득한 동굴을 찾으려면 어디로 항해해야 하오?

lyrics.english: East!
lyrics.korean: 동쪽!

lyrics.english: Thank you!
lyrics.korean: 고맙소!

lyrics.english: Welcome!
lyrics.korean: 천만에!

lyrics.english: This life is amazing when you greet it with open arms
lyrics.korean: 두 팔 벌려 맞이할 때 이 삶은 정말 놀라워요

lyrics.english: I see in your face, there is so much guilt inside your heart
lyrics.korean: 당신의 얼굴을 보니, 당신 마음 속에는 너무도 많은 죄책감이 가득하군요

lyrics.english: So why not replace it and light up the world?
lyrics.korean: 그것을 대신해 세상을 환히 밝히는 게 어때요?
